title: Anacostia Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       The park welcomes everyone to have a great time. Entrances to the park are accessible from bridge sidewalk ramps. The parking lots throughout the park are paved with handicap parking spaces. The newly paved Anacostia River Trail that spans the length of the park along the river is wheelchair accessible. All restrooms throughout the park are accessible and the skating pavilion has wheel chair accessible ramps that gives access to the facility. Some picnic tables are located on the grass.
